title: 24-hour trade union action on Wednesday: RTUA
body_lines: The Railway Trade Union Alliance (RTUA) today decided to indulge in a 24-hour trade union action on Wednesday, February 27, midnight in solidarity to the people's struggle.
Accordingly, the trade union action will start on April 27 midnight and end on April 28 midnight.
They said the decision to engage in the trade union action was made by the Trade Union Coordination Centre (TUCC) considering the current issues that have emerged due to the economic woes.
Therefore, the RTUA requested the 27 trade unions that are currently active in the Railways department to engage in the scheduled trade union action. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
